summary: THE TRANSMISSION IN THE VEHICLE DID NOT WORK PROPERLY (HARD SHIFTING).  THE CONSUMER KNEW OF TECHNICAL SERVICE BULLETINS ISSUED FOR THIS PROBLEM.   *NLM   *AK   THE VEHICLE DID NOT SHIFT HARD AT SPEEDS OF UP 25 MPH.  *SCC  *JB. THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE DID NOT SHIFT PROPERLY AND ACCELERATE PROPERLY FROM A STOP.  *JB
